fields.name: ActCostMeth_GASB
fields.description: Actuarial Cost Method for GASB reporting. The actuarial cost method is used to apportion the total cost of funding an employee's benefits in retirement to each year of their worklife. The annually apportioned amount is the normal cost.

fields.name: AssetValMeth_GASB
fields.description: Asset Valuation Method for GASB reporting. . The asset valuation method describes the method used for calculating actuarial asset levels. Often, when calculating actuarial assets, plans use actuarial techniques that smooth out fluctuations in the level of

fields.name: FundingMeth_GASB
fields.description: Funding Method for GASB reporting. The funding method describes the method used to amortize the UAAL. The method has two key parameters: 1) the amortization payment type: whether the amortization payments will be level in dollar amount or level as a perce

fields.name: InflationAssumption_GASB
fields.description: Inflation Assumption for GASB reporting. The inflation assumption underlies other economic assumptions for the plan, such as the long-term investment return, individual employee salary growth, and the overall payroll growth for the plan. Importantly, for

fields.name: InvestmentReturnAssumption_GASB
fields.description: Long-term investment return assumption GASB reporting. For public pension plans, the long-term investment return is used to discount actuarial liabilities.

fields.name: ActCostMethCode_GASB
fields.description: A integeral code for the plan's Actuarial Cost method for GASB reporting purposes.

fields.name: AssetValMethCode_GASB
fields.description: A integeral code for the plan's Asset Valuation method for GASB reporting purposes. The asset valuation method describes the method used for calculating actuarial asset levels. Often, when calculating actuarial assets, plans use actuarial techniques that

fields.name: AssetSmoothingPeriod_GASB
fields.description: Asset smoothing period for GASB reporting.

fields.name: FundingMethCode1_GASB
fields.description: A integeral code for amortization payment type.

fields.name: FundingMethCode2_GASB
fields.description: A integeral code for amortization period type.

fields.name: UAALAmortPeriod_GASB
fields.description: Remaining UAAL amortization period for GASB reporting. The remaining period over which the UAAL will be amortized.

fields.name: ActValDate_GASBAssumptions
fields.description: Actuarial Valuation Date for GASB Assumptions.
